ai-tha-ap480:0.3_0: he took the fruit of the Elders’ garden of the Fruit of Chief Disciples
ai-tha-ap480:1.2_0: this (thought) is the reason why it is shameless,
ai-tha-ap480:1.4_0: or stood in the mango grove.
ai-tha-ap480:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap480:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap480:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vappa.
ai-tha-ap480:7.1_0: for the eighth year of the Elders.
